channel.title: PI, Diffrent attack emotes when shield equipped?

item.title: PI, Diffrent attack emotes when shield equipped?
item.dc:creator: @corpze corpze
item.description:
@corpze wrote:

hi guys, i got thiese models added , 2 swords, 1 in each hand. im trying to do so that if u have only the main hand one it makes emote 451 when attacking and with both it makes emote 1658, but my code dosent work,

here is the code i putted under : public int getWepAnim(String weaponName) {
in combatassistant

if(weaponName.contains("Flame r") && c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerShield]).toLowerCase().contains("Flame l")){ return 1658; } if(weaponName.contains("Flame r") && !c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerShield]).toLowerCase().contains("Flame l")){ return 451; }

Read full topic
item.source: PI, Diffrent attack emotes when shield equipped?
